snippet: Some political candidates offer donors the chance to rub elbows with celebrities. But Bill de Blasio is offering the chance to play table tennis against one.
abstract: Trailside blog; some political candidates offer donors the chance to rub elbows with celebrities, but New York City mayoral candidate Bill de Blasio is offering one donor the chance to play table tennis against him; actress and political activist Susan Sarandon is hosting fund-raiser for de Blasio at SPiN New York, her table tennis club in Flatiron district.
lead_paragraph: Some political candidates offer donors the chance to rub elbows with celebrities. But Bill de Blasio is offering the chance to play table tennis against one.

headline.main: Perks for Donors: Table Tennis Game
headline.print_headline:
Perk for Donors:
Table Tennis Game
